notes: Batch block contains repeating metadata fields: batch_no, scale_1, start_time_1, date_act_1, scale_2, start_time_2, date_act_2, batch_date, main1_value, main1_detail, main2_value, main2_detail, batch_shift_no, recipe_name, recipe_code_detail, recipe_no. These are part of the repeatable BLOCK_REPEAT structure.
